hero.title: Discover Your Dream Home in China's Premium Markets
hero.subtitle: Expert guidance through luxury real estate in Beijing, Shanghai, and emerging investment opportunities across China.

intro.title: Redefining Luxury Real Estate Excellence
intro.description1: With over a decade of experience in China's dynamic property markets, I specialize in connecting discerning clients with exceptional homes and investment opportunities.
intro.description2: From historic hutongs in Beijing to modern penthouses in Shanghai, every property tells a story of luxury, culture, and strategic investment potential.

properties.title: Featured Properties
properties.subtitle: Discover exceptional properties across China's most prestigious locations
properties.searchPlaceholder: Luxury isn't a price — it's a feeling. Describe yours and we will find your perfect space.

insights.title: Market Insights
insights.subtitle: Stay informed with the latest trends and analysis from China's luxury real estate markets

contact.title: Let's Find Your Perfect Property
contact.subtitle: Ready to explore luxury real estate opportunities? I'm here to guide you through every step of your journey.
